pbi.title: As a KCC manager, I want to define clear user roles and permissions in Salesforce
pbi.description: Implement a comprehensive role-based access control system for KCC employees with distinct permission sets for different user types (medewerker, junior, senior, coach, editor, supervisor)
acceptance_criteria: Define roles: medewerker, junior, senior, coach, redacteur, eindredacteur
Create permission set groups for Knowledge Reader, Author, Editor, and Supervisor
Map roles to specific permissions in Salesforce
Enable automatic role assignment via AD groups
notes: Support four-eyes principle for article approval
Consider future multilingual and cross-departmental knowledge sharing

strengths: Clear user story with specific roles
Explicit support for four-eyes approval principle

risk_flags.message: Complex role hierarchy with multiple user types may lead to intricate permission configuration and potential access conflicts
Active Directory integration could introduce synchronization challenges and potential authentication bottlenecks
Insufficient granularity in permission sets may result in unauthorized data access or non-compliance with organizational security policies
Extensive role-based access control system might introduce latency in user authentication and permission validation processes

suggestions: Create a detailed permission matrix documenting specific access levels for each role (medewerker, junior, senior, coach, editor, supervisor) with explicit read/write/modify rights for key Salesforce objects
Conduct a performance impact assessment to validate the proposed role-based access control system's scalability and potential system latency implications
Design an integration strategy with Active Directory to enable automated user provisioning and synchronize role assignments across systems
Include a comprehensive test plan that validates role-based permissions through multiple scenario-based access validation tests
Document clear governance and review process for future role modifications, including approval workflows and periodic access audits

risks.description: Complex role hierarchy with multiple user types creates intricate permission configuration challenges
risks.mitigation: Create a detailed permission matrix with explicit access rights for each role type, implement role hierarchy validation tests

risks.description: Potential compliance and security risks due to insufficient permission granularity
risks.mitigation: Develop comprehensive permission set definitions with strict access controls, implement periodic access audits

risks.description: Active Directory integration may introduce synchronization and authentication challenges
risks.mitigation: Design robust integration strategy with automated sync mechanisms, implement error handling and logging for provisioning processes

risks.description: Performance overhead from complex role-based access control system
risks.mitigation: Conduct thorough performance impact assessment, optimize permission validation processes, implement caching mechanisms

recommendations: Create detailed permission matrix with exact access levels for each role
Resolve outstanding critical and high-priority questions
Define precise permission granularity for each role type
